title: Creating Plat+ Dynamic Team!!! LF Jungle and ADC (Top maybe?)
body:
A new rising team is looking for players of plat+
We are seeking dedicated players, willing to learn and adapt to different play styles. Communication is key so skype is a must!
If you're tired of just having fun (not saying we wont) and want to look for something serious, you've come to the right place.
Feel free to add me in game to tryout!

Please fill out this application ^.^

Age:
Skype/Curse:
Time Zone:
Role:
Rank THIS Season:
Last season (Final Rank when season ended):
Play style(Agro/Passive.... Reactive/Proactive):
Why should i pick you? What will you bring to the team?:
Top 5 Champions:

Goodluck and have fun,

Cory Baxter

replies.body:

Why should i pick you? What will you bring to the team?: Lots of team play, builds for the team , peeling back and in general easy wins
